LanguageData.AIRobot_SendOwnerToRecharge: Recall and deactivate the active robot.
LanguageData.AIRobot_RecallAllRobots: Recall and deactivate all active robots.
LanguageData.AIRobot_FindRobot: Shows the position of the robot.
LanguageData.AIRobot_Disabled_OnlyStartOnHomeMap: Only start on your home map. Mod will throw errors when leaving here with an active robot!
LanguageData.AIRobot_MessageRechargeStationOutsideAre: Assigned robot area does not include the recharge station! Resetting..
LanguageData.AIRobot_ShutDownRobot: Click to send the robot to its base for shutdown.
LanguageData.AIRobot_ShutDownAllRobots: Click to send all robots to their base for shutdown.
LanguageData.AIRobot_RepairRobot_hint: Your robot is damaged. Repairing will cost you:
LanguageData.AIRobot_CannotRepairRobotIsActive: Robot is active -> Please deactivate to repair it.
